cleaned_text: Image 1 of 3 Image 2 of 3 Image 3 of 3 Detox Stress Hand Sanitizer Gel by Pearl Apothecary from $5.00 Our Detox Stress Hand Sanitizer is a client favorite for its gentle, moisturizing and non-sticky formula and clean scent. We use the finest therapeutic and organic essential oils including Lemongrass, Cypress, and Juniper to detoxify and release stuck emotions, Geranium and Melissa to lift the spirit, and grounding Lavender and Patchouli. The light and refreshing blend helps you manage stress and detox negative emotions. Aroma : Citrusy, herbal, sweet Mood
